item.content:encoded: Photo: Smonex Organize games like Gloomhaven and Wingspan with style Board games are fun, but getting them to and from the table can be a hassle. Smonex is one of several companies that has created laser-cut box organizers, and they‚Äôre all on sale for Cyber Monday. So let‚Äôs get your monthly Gloomhaven campaign nights moving a bit more quickly with this $45 organizer. Your friends will thank you. A custom board game pack-in is a decadent upgrade, but fortunately you probably don‚Äôt need all th...

item.content:encoded: Image: Larian Studios Building on Black Friday‚Äôs amazing 0% deal with another 0% off deal for Cyber Monday You won‚Äôt find Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 on sale this Cyber Monday. And yet, we believe it‚Äôs still one of the best video game deals this holiday season. Across the Polygon team, we‚Äôve collectively put hundreds ‚Äî if not thousands ‚Äî of hours into the CRPG. item.title: Lethal Company is the morbidly hilarious game taking Twitch by storm | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: You and three friends can attempt to make quota together. | Image: Zeekerss We will make quota. We will make quota. We will make quota. The first time I played Lethal Company, I had barely walked 50...
item.content:encoded: You and three friends can attempt to make quota together. | Image: Zeekerss We will make quota. We will make quota. We will make quota. The first time I played Lethal Company, I had barely walked 50 feet from our spaceship when I sank into some quicksand and died. The next time, I was obliterated by an automated turret, not because I walked in its way, but because one of my colleagues bashed it with a stop sign in a failed attempt to break it. In another mission, I was unceremoniously dragged ...

item.content:encoded: The bastion that your gaming group deserves When the ‚Äúnew‚Äù version of Dungeons & Dragons launches in 2024, one of the additions coming to the seminal role-playing game‚Äôs Dungeon Master‚Äôs Guide will be bastions ‚Äî headquarters that groups can opt into for their games. WizKids latest creation, simply called The Watchtower, would fit the bill nicely. It‚Äôs a modular wonder that puts the G.I. Joe aircraft carrier to shame. The plastic terrain set goes up for order on Amazon today. We‚Äôve had it on the...

item.content:encoded: Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon Everything you need to begin your journey is on sale If learning to paint miniatures is on your nerdy bucket list, then I have good news for you: Getting started has never been easier, with loads of helpful tutorials available online ‚Äî including here at Polygon. item.content:encoded: Charlie Hall/Polygon One of Fantasy Flight‚Äôs most overlooked gems is discounted, along with hundreds of other games Fallout The Board Game is an overlooked gem from Fantasy Flight Games‚Äô back catalog, and it‚Äôs on sale for Amazon‚Äôs Cyber Monday board game sale this year. It makes a great gift for fans of the series, as it leverages Bethesda‚Äôs penchant for telling interesting stories in the wastelands. item.content:encoded: Image: Kieran Yanner/Wizards of the Coast Return to Krynn deals on Dragonlance Dungeons & Dragons‚Äô biggest release of the year, Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen Deluxe Edition, is on sale for Cyber Monday. It bundles the excellent new Dragonlance campaign with the exciting Dragonlance: Warriors of Krynn board game co-designed by Rob Daviau (Pandemic Legacy, Ticket to Ride Legacy: Legends of the West). At $61.99, the book-and-game bundle was originally prices at $155 by Wizards of the Co...

item.description: Posted by Tapio Schneider, Visiting Researcher, and Yi-fan Chen, Engineering Lead, Google Research Today‚Äôs climate models successfully capture broad global warming trends. However, because of unce...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Tapio Schneider, Visiting Researcher, and Yi-fan Chen, Engineering Lead, Google Research Today‚Äôs climate models successfully capture broad global warming trends. However, because of uncertainties about processes that are small in scale yet globally important, such as clouds and ocean turbulence, these models‚Äô predictions of upcoming climate changes are not very accurate in detail. For example, predictions of the time by which the global mean surface temperature of Earth will have w...

item.title: Open sourcing Project Guideline: A platform for computer vision accessibility technology | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Dave Hawkey, Software Engineer, Google Research Two years ago we announced Project Guideline, a collaboration between Google Research and Guiding Eyes for the Blind that enabled people w...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Dave Hawkey, Software Engineer, Google Research Two years ago we announced Project Guideline, a collaboration between Google Research and Guiding Eyes for the Blind that enabled people with visual impairments (e.g., blindness and low-vision) to walk, jog, and run independently. Using only a Google Pixel phone and headphones, Project Guideline leverages on-device machine learning (ML) to navigate users along outdoor paths marked with a painted line. The technology has been tested al...

item.title: Scaling multimodal understanding to long videos | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Isaac Noble, Software Engineer, Google Research, and Anelia Angelova, Research Scientist, Google DeepMind When building machine learning models for real-life applications, we need to conside...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Isaac Noble, Software Engineer, Google Research, and Anelia Angelova, Research Scientist, Google DeepMind When building machine learning models for real-life applications, we need to consider inputs from multiple modalities in order to capture various aspects of the world around us. For example, audio, video, and text all provide varied and complementary information about a visual input. However, building multimodal models is challenging due to the heterogeneity of the modalities. Some...
